com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Interface BleManager.ResetListener

  • Enclosing class:
    BleManager

    public static interface BleManager.ResetListener
    Provide an implementation to BleManager.reset(BleManager.ResetListener) to be notified when a reset operation is complete.
    See Also:
    BleManager.reset(BleManager.ResetListener)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BleManager.ResetListener.Progress
      Enumeration of the progress of the reset.
      static class  BleManager.ResetListener.ResetEvent
      Struct passed to onEvent(BleManager.ResetListener.ResetEvent).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEvent(BleManager.ResetListener.ResetEvent e)
      The reset event, for now only fired when the reset is completed.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(BleManager.ResetListener.ResetEvent e)
        The reset event, for now only fired when the reset is completed. Hopefully the bluetooth stack is OK now.
